description: details of a a single category, identified by id or key (if a well-known category)

canMultiSelect.description: true if an object can have multiple values for this category

leafSelectionOnly.description: true if an object can have only leaf selections for this category

mandatory.description: whether a value for the category is mandatory

message.description: a message to help the candidate/user when entering values for the category - e.g. 'tell us the top 4 stores you really want to work at'

key.description: used to identify categories that are well-known, i.e. agreed on by all apps. User-defined categories don't have a key

name.description: the user visible name for this category
